column5: You'll love the Back Door de Milagro, a Bed & Breakfast located on a twenty-seven acre fruit farm. Our mission-style hacienda and wooded vistas make this the ideal get away even if for one night. The Back Door is good for couples, solo adventurers, and business travelers. We do private parties and dinners, as well.
column8: Take a Break; Unplug at the BNB on Milagro Farms
